title: [1.12.2-1.10.2][AstralSorcery——星辉魔法]源自星空和星座的魔法力量[IRCN]
author: 残枫落血
txt_content:
本帖最后由 残枫落血 于 2018-7-11 09:13 编辑 
AstralSorcery[星辉魔法]



简介[你可以玩到些什么]原帖介绍：Astral Sorcery is a magic mod focused around harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations. 
Explore and discover the world and the sky above you; focus starlight to your will, strengthening yourself or 
enhancing the world around you.

The mod itself has an ingame guide in form of the 'Journal' which will guide you through the mod if 
readcarefully (Navigation in the journal is via mouse drag + scroll zoom). Certain structures in the world are 
required for proper progression.

Astral Sorcery Discord: https://discord.gg/q37VRcT for questions or whatever~

Important notes:
- If you encounter any issues or crashes, please report them on the issue tracker if they weren't reported 
already.
- Using 'AUTO' GUI scale is not encouraged as there might be scaling issues.

Configuration:
The mod allows for a multitude of configurations of certain features, as well as options for maintainance and stability. Additionally, there are options for mod version-tracking and built-in retrogen to add structures/gen from newer versions to worlds that had AstralSorcery on older versions.

Mine/CraftTweaker Integration:

The .zs file for all the possible configurations + examples can be found here
The implementation of the Integration can be found here and subdirectories

Modpack policy:

- You are not allowed to make any money that involves any part of the mod; Excluding monetization in form of CursePoints from modpack downloads.
- You must provide a link back to this page in case you're using this mod when using it in packs.

Mod Tutorial/Spotlight:
Made by Mischief of Mice

本人介绍：星辉魔法（AstralSorcery）是一个脑洞大开的魔法模组，它从星空中获取能量，从星座中学习魔法，用一种奇特的方式把魔法展现出来，堪称前所未有，是一个足以与植物魔法、神秘时代相提并论的新一代魔法模组。
这个模组特色十足，拥有精美的材质和特效，其中的各个机器也十分地实用，而且还有一些十分BUG的功能：比如······把钻石矿变成绿宝石矿？？
这个模组还有个十分有趣的功能——望远镜看夜空。你可以借助望远镜观察夜空，并把你看到的星辰描绘下来。本模组还拥有许多的多方块结构和独特的能源系统与熔炼系统，是魔法模组内的精品。
总之，星辉魔法（AstralSorcery），你值得拥有！
图片[美丽的星空世界]
[用这本星空日记开始你的征途]
[我的征途是星辰大海]
[坐落于山间的古代神殿]
[丰富的魔法物品]
更新/BUG[爱看不看的内容]原帖更新：
Addition: Crafttweaker integration as it was back in 1.11.2/1.10.2 - Scripts have to be provided on Server AND Client. If they don't have the same scripts, issues may arise.


Fix: WorldProvider for solar eclipse overwrite was missing re-init

Fix: Enchantment registration order

Fix: GUI being closed in the network thread, causing the Blur mod to crash.

Fix: Minor visual issues.
本帖更新：
2018.7.11
时隔一年久违的更新，更新到1.9.3

2017.7.24
发布帖子，最新版本1.61

replies.author: chychy1
replies.txt_content: 目前2017年7月27日 10:54:37 最新版本1.12-1.6.1 发现BUG。大理石台阶在生存模式下一敲就碎并且没有掉落(用镐可以掉落)；精致大理石柱和大理石台阶无法合成，按合成表只能合出大理石横梁，因为大理石横梁的合成表中3个大理石可以是任意种类的大理石，覆盖了需要指定大理石的合成表(精致大理石柱中间是雕文大理石、大理石台阶3个都是大理石砖)。麻烦帮忙汇报给作者，我不懂英文！

replies.author: 没糖的葫芦
replies.txt_content:
【3-1】标题格式：([BGM])[最高支持版本-最低支持版本]+[Mod本名——Mod译名]+其他

【3-2】标题格式说明：
「版本号」例：[1.12.2-1.7.10]，若支持0.1阶段全版本亦可写作[#.#.X] 例：[1.12.X]；
「Mod本名」即Mod作者公开的Mod官方名称；「Mod译名」 请参考《Minecraft Mod简体中文翻译规范与指南》07；
「BGM」若帖内含有自动播放的音乐请务必在帖子最前端添加此项，并将音乐代码置于帖子开头；
请严格按照格式要求的顺序和内容填写标题，请勿在标题中使用“【】”、“~”等不规范字符，保持版面美观整洁的阅读环境。
标题不符合版规要求，注意修改emmm
